posts.post_content:
This card is so good for getting out early powerful cards like, [Progenitus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Progenitus), [Time Stretch](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Time Stretch), [It That Betrays](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=It That Betrays), [Darksteel Colossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Colossus), [Ulamog](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ulamog), [Emrakul](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Emrakul), [Autochthon Wurm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Autochthon Wurm), [Pathrazer of Ulamog](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Pathrazer of Ulamog), [Plague Wind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Plague Wind), [Searing Wind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Searing Wind), [Eternal Dominion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Eternal Dominion), [Kozilek](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kozilek), [Krosan Cloudscraper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Krosan Cloudscraper), etc, etc, etc.  
  
Epic card.  
  
  
  
5/5

posts.post_content: Because "cast" is the same as "play" when it comes to spells, you can't use her to get around epic limitations (though perhaps you could use her to cast two epic spells simultaneously, while one is still on the stack?).
posts.html:
Because "cast" is the same as "play" when it comes to spells, you can't use her to get around epic limitations (though perhaps you could use her to cast two epic spells simultaneously, while one is still on the stack?).
Report Abuse  
Posted By: JaronK (2/7/2011 1:11:29 AM)
Rating:

@MindSculptor : yes, you could storm twice with Dragonstorm, if the spells are all activating on your upkeep, you choose the order. So choose Dragonstorm first, then the other two so they'll resolve first, and you'll get your 3 dragons!

@MechaKraken : yes, you have to exile suspended cards face-up. even if the card itself says "exile (or suspend) this card face-down", since you're using Jhoira's ability, and not the cards actual suspending rules.

@LeoKula : i know, right??? too bad Emrakul was just banned for EDH play, he was gonna make a killer addition to my Jhoira deck.... oh well, still have every other Eldrazi
